full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Reference Information

* **Solicitation Number**: EP745-231001/A
* **Reference Number**: PW-__ZF-524-41101
* **Date of Publication**: Tuesday, September 13, 2022
* **Closing Date**: Wednesday, September 22, 2022, 2:00 PM Eastern Time

## Details of the Tender

* **Title**: Translation Services (English to French)
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Strategy**: Selective tendering (competitive bidding)
* **Commodity Code**: [R109D] Translation Services

## Objective

The Translation Services is issued by the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) to solicit proposals from suppliers for the provision of translation services from English to French, specifically in the field of "Border services" over the course of 15 months with a total volume of up to 20,000,000 words. The procurement will be performed under the commodity code [R109D].

## Pre-Qualified Suppliers

The Pre-Qualified suppliers who are invited to submit a bid are:

1. UBIQUS OTTAWA INC.
2. SYNTAGME INC.
3. R&R INTERNATIONAL TRANSLATION
4. NATIONS TRANSLATION GROUP LP

## Request for Proposal Documents

The bid solicitation documents will be sent to the above-mentioned pre-qualified suppliers via email from the Contracting Officer, Mongeon, Anick at anick.mongeon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

## Inquiries

Any inquiries regarding this solicitation shall be directed to the Contracting Authority via email: TPSGC.PADDSBT-APRFPTB.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

## Delivery Date

The required services will be delivered as specified in the Request for Proposal.

## Right to Negotiate

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with the suppliers on any procurement conditions.

## Official Language Use

Documents may be submitted in either official language (English or French).
